msItem.note: The manuscript breaks off in the middle of a sentence at the bottom of . The missing part is about one-fifth of the complete .
ይቤ፡ መጠሊጎን፡: The translator apparently mistook μετ' ὀλίγων for a nomen proprium, while this section (55) still belongs to the sayings of .
One and a half columns are blank on , but the text is uninterrupted.

handNote.seg: Written in a fair hand, possibly 18th century.
Written in a fair hand, possibly 18th century.
In the latter part of the manuscript, rubrication has not been consistently applied.

history.provenance: The manuscript was given to the by in 1910.
